title: Enhancing E-Learning Practical Competencies: Workshop on Developing Student Engagement Measurement Tools in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners identify five core elements (self-regulated learning, cognitive strategies, learning emotions, interaction, and school life enjoyment) measuring student engagement in blended learning environments with over 80% accuracy.
Learners design a customized engagement measurement tool with 20+ items by applying the GSES scale development methodology.
Learners implement a mixed measurement method combining online surveys and face-to-face observation to develop a tool with reliability of 0.7 or higher.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
